sentence.Network_cn: 他们态度轻蔑，不屑一顾。

sentence.Network_en: Guan and Zhang had nothing more to say , But they walked away sneeringly.
sentence.Network_cn: 关羽、张飞无话, 冷笑着走了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: sneering 嘲笑的sneeringly 嘲笑地sneeze into a basket 被斩首
the revolutionary idea that professor hoyle would eventually sneeringly label the big bang ., 那个霍伊尔教授最终嘲讽过的宇宙大爆炸.

entry.def: To refer sneeringly to someone or something means to refer to them in a way that shows your contempt for them.

example.ex: ...those in what the Tories sneeringly call the 'chattering classes'...
example.tran: 被保守党讥讽为“名嘴阶层”的那些人
他们态度轻蔑，不屑一顾。

means.word_mean: 1. with a sneer; in an uncomplimentary sneering manner;

sentences.sentence: "`I don't believe in these customs,' he said sneeringly"
